name: Adelie - Chasing Pavements
description:
Survive being chased by a rolling snowball with a crafty penguin.

Pickup, combine, and throw objects to delay the snowball's inevitable descent!

No background music because of the deadline and also I don't know how to make background music.

Controls

Arrows - Move
Z - Jump
X - Pickup/Throw

by Kris De Asis

For Ludum Dare 50
